name: PracticeGermanNumbers
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: practice german numbers
des:
This skill helps users to better their listening comprehension with German numbers. There are three difficulty levels: easy, medium, and difficult. 

- Easy level: numbers 0-99, spoken slowly and said twice
- Medium level: numbers 0-499, spoken slower than Alexa's normal speed but said once
- Difficult level: numbers 0-999 spoken once at normal speed

At any skill level, if you want to hear the number again, say "Repeat".
While answering questions, you can say 'Easier' or 'Harder' to change the skill level mid-Skill.

The skill presents 10 questions at a time and then prompts the user whether or not they wish to continue. When the user exits normally after a series of 10 questions or by saying 'Stop', they will receive a score for the questions answered during that session.
